mapper.select: SELECT A.system_id, A.system_name, A.system_price, A.system_service_price_year, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'N' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'F' THEN '冻结' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '删除' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, B.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM bank_worker_base.system_setting A LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id WHERE A.system_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.data_status = #{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_worker_base.system_setting ( system_name, system_price, system_service_price_year, data_status, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{systemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{servicePrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'N', #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bank_worker_base.system_setting SET WHERE system_id = #{systemID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
